name: The Enchanted Stones of Cameronne
description:
The game is inspired by the great game Ishido for the Gameboy. 

In this game you have to place 72 enchanted stones on the board. Every stone has two attributes: color and symbol.

There are six symbols and six colours, creating 36 unique stones Each stone has a twin, thus 72.

Just 4 simple rules how to set the stones

1) To create a one-way match you must match your stone with either color or symbol of the other stone.



2) To create a two-way match you must match your stone using color for one stone and the symbol for the other stone.



3) To create a three-way match you must match your stone using color for one stone and symbol for the other two stones - or vice versa.



4) To create a four-way match you must match your stone using color for two stones and symbol for the other two stone.



Hints

Try to make as many four-sided as possible. This is the only way to reach high scores. 
Think and prepare to make four points. Remember that each stone exists twice. This allows to prepare four-sided properly and after a few games you will easily get 6 or more four-ways each game. 

Points

Single-sided2Two-sided5Three-sided10Four-sided 
plus 25 Bonus for every previous
four-sided in this game25Bonus for Board completed:250

Play online

The game is available to play online here: https://blue-genie.de/cameronne

or play it in your own emulator or on the real hardware.
